# 1 Intro

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
df <- read_excel("Data/MCAS/Estados_US/Edos_USA_2010/Edos_USA_2010/Californiacompact2010/Californiaedomexmuni2010F.xlsx")
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
# unzip .zip files
data_path <- "Data/MCAS/Estados_US/Edos_USA_2013/Edos_USA_2013"
zip_files <- list.files(path = data_path, pattern = "*.zip", full.names = TRUE)

# unzip all files into their own folders
lapply(zip_files, function(x) {
  unzip(x, exdir = sub(".zip", "", x))
})
```

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(archive)
# unzip .rar files
data_path <- "Data/MCAS/Estados_US/Edos_USA_2013/Edos_USA_2013"
rar_files <- list.files(path = data_path, pattern = "\\.rar$", full.names = TRUE)

# loop through & extract
for (file in rar_files) {
  archive_extract(file, dir = sub(".rar", "", file))
}
```
